item.title: Losing items in a safe zone
item.dc:creator: @Ill_Pk_You Ill Pk You
item.description:
@Ill_Pk_You wrote:

[quote=“Guthixthegod, post:2, topic:281603”]If it’s not calleed Client.java it might be called Client Like Mine Hoped this helped

Furother Help - Email me Live - Joshs.world.1@hotmail.co.uk[/quote]

That didn’t help a bit to be fair…

kickingjamie:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,355213.0.html

Thanks, I’ll try this.

EDIT: This is just creating a FunPk zone… I want it so you don’t lose items when you’re not in the wild. Plus, I already have my own FunPk zone.

Read full topic

item.title: Losing items in a safe zone
item.dc:creator: @Ill_Pk_You Ill Pk You
item.description:
@Ill_Pk_You wrote:

Well, I tried making it so you don’t lose items when you’re in a safe zone. Heres my deathstage (Delta);

if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && !isInWilderness) { toX = 3094+misc.random(3); toY = 3471+misc.random(3); AtkPray = 0; StrPrayer = 0; DefPray = 0; RangePray = 0; MagePray = 0; PrayHeal = false; ProtItem = false; ProtMage = false; ProtRange = false; ProtMelee = false; Redemption = false; Retribution = false; Smite = false; Chivalry = false; Piety = false; isSkulled = false; lastSkull = 0; headIcon = 0; turnpray(); heightLevel = 0; currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; deathStage = 0; resetAnimation(); frame1(); prayOn = false; AntiTeleDelay = 0; EntangleDelay = 0; sM("Oh dear you have died!"); resetOtherAtk(); }

I copied that from my FunPk deathstage, (you dont lose items in funpk) and just changed where it checks.

I said !isInWilderness because its checking if their not in the wild. (For people who say that it might be that without saying why?)

Anyone know why I lose items in a safe zone?

Helps in advance.

Read full topic
item.source: Losing items in a safe zone
